subject: Re:. F.riendshi.p
body:
Hire,
i am here sitting in athe internet caffe. Found your eamail and
decided ato write. I might be coming to your place in 14 days, 
so I decided to email you. May be we can meet? I am 25 y.o.
girl. I have a picture if you want. No need to reply here as 
this is not my email. Write me at zv@BounceEmail.info
